thread.title: Honor 6X with dual rear cameras launching in India on January 24th
thread.title_full: Honor 6X with dual rear cameras launching in India on January 24th

title: Honor 6X with dual rear cameras launching in India on January 24th
text:
Honor 6X with dual rear cameras launching in India on January 24th Honor 6X with dual rear cameras launching in India on January 24th By   Honor 6X features dual 12MP and 2MP cameras at the rear” 
Huawei’s sub-brand Honor has sent out press invites for the Honor 6X launch in India on January 24th. The smartphone was officially unveiled at CES in Las Vegas yesterday.For the uninitiated, the Honor 6X ( first impressions ) was launched in China in October. The phone features a 12MP rear snapper, along with another 2MP sensor. It comes with a 5.5-inch full HD display, an all-metal body, a fingerprint sensor, an 8MP selfie snapper, an octa-core Kirin 655 SoC, 3GB and 4GB RAM variants, 32GB and 64GB storage options, Android Marshmallow, and a 3,340mAh battery with fast charging. 
The Honor 6X’s price in China starts at around Rs 9,000. We will have its price and availability details for India in the coming weeks. Facebook Comments
